description: Control your velux equipment with your voice! this requires a velux remote hack

intents.name: Velux_DoAction
intents.description: The user wants to drive a Velux equipement
utterances: can you {open:=>Action} the {windows:=>Device} to {50 percent:=>Percentage} {for 15 minutes:=>Duration}
do {open:=>Action} the {windows:=>Device} in the {living room:=>Location} {for 15 minutes:=>Duration}
please {open:=>Action} the {windows:=>Device} in the {living room:=>Location} {for 15 minutes:=>Duration}
